headline.main: High School Hockey Program Shut Down Over Anti-Semitism
headline.print_headline: High School Hockey Program Shut Down Over Anti-Semitism

docs.snippet: A Massachusetts high school hockey program has had its season canceled because of what one administrator called a "toxic" culture of anti-Semitism among players....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts high school hockey program has had its season canceled because of what one administrator called a "toxic" culture of anti-Semitism among players.

headline.main: Use Labels to Sort Messages in Gmail

headline.main: Euro Zone Lenders Confident on Quick Solution on Greek Debt Spat-Source
headline.print_headline: Euro Zone Lenders Confident on Quick Solution on Greek Debt Spat-Source

docs.snippet: Greece's euro zone lenders are confident a solution can be found shortly on reactivating short-term debt relief measures that were suspended after Athens decided to make an unexpected payout to poor pensioners, a euro zone source said on Wednesday...
docs.lead_paragraph: Greece's euro zone lenders are confident a solution can be found shortly on reactivating short-term debt relief measures that were suspended after Athens decided to make an unexpected payout to poor pensioners, a euro zone source said on Wednesday.

headline.main: EU Court Says Mass Data Retention Illegal
headline.print_headline: EU Court Says Mass Data Retention Illegal

docs.snippet: The mass retention of data is illegal, the European Union's highest court said on Wednesday, dealing a blow to Britain's newly passed surveillance law and signaling that security concerns do not justify excessive privacy infringements....
docs.lead_paragraph: The mass retention of data is illegal, the European Union's highest court said on Wednesday, dealing a blow to Britain's newly passed surveillance law and signaling that security concerns do not justify excessive privacy infringements.

headline.main: Turkish Prosecutors Probing Why Russian Envoy's Killer Not Taken Alive: State Media
headline.print_headline: Turkish Prosecutors Probing Why Russian Envoy's Killer Not Taken Alive: State Media

docs.snippet: Turkish prosecutors are investigating why the off-duty policeman who shot dead Russia's ambassador to Turkey was not captured alive, state media said on Wednesday, as the number of people arrested over the killing rose to 11....
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkish prosecutors are investigating why the off-duty policeman who shot dead Russia's ambassador to Turkey was not captured alive, state media said on Wednesday, as the number of people arrested over the killing rose to 11.

headline.main: Daily Report: Using Fake Users and Sites to Steal Real Money

headline.main: Lydia Polgreen on Leaving to Lead Huffington Post: ‘Hardest Decision I’ve Ever Made’

headline.main: NCAA: Baylor Penalized for Football Recruiting Violations
headline.print_headline: NCAA: Baylor Penalized for Football Recruiting Violations

headline.main: Arizona Police: No Arrests in Theft of FedEx Delivery Truck
headline.print_headline: Arizona Police: No Arrests in Theft of FedEx Delivery Truck

docs.snippet: Police in suburban Phoenix say two men who stole a FedEx delivery truck from its driver at gunpoint remain at large and that the company is still working to find out how many packages are missing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police in suburban Phoenix say two men who stole a FedEx delivery truck from its driver at gunpoint remain at large and that the company is still working to find out how many packages are missing.
